Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: One of the most heavily armed and armored 'Mechs ever constructed, the King Crab 0000 is capable of massive burst damage. A pair of heavy, close-range Autocannons form its primary weaponry, backed up by ranged weaponry to fire as it closes distance.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: One of the most heavily armed and armored 'Mechs ever constructed, the King Crab 0000 is capable of massive burst damage. A pair of heavy, close-range Autocannons form its primary weaponry, backed up by ranged weaponry to fire as it closes distance.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: One of the most heavily armed and armored 'Mechs ever constructed, the King Crab 0000 is capable of massive burst damage. A pair of heavy, close-range Autocannons form its primary weaponry, backed up by ranged weaponry to fire as it closes distance.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The Shadow Hawk KM is an interesting model. Its default payload sacrifices a lot of armor to mount a bit more firepower, though some argue the tradeoff isn't worth it. Its Alpha Strikes are better, though, so… I guess you can be the judge.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: The Shadow Hawk KM is an interesting model. Its default payload sacrifices a lot of armor to mount a bit more firepower, though some argue the tradeoff isn't worth it. Its Alpha Strikes are better, though, so… I guess you can be the judge.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The Shadow Hawk 2D is an interesting model. Its default payload sacrifices a lot of armor to mount a bit more firepower, though some argue the tradeoff isn't worth it. Its Alpha Strikes are better, though, so… I guess you can be the judge.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: The Shadow Hawk 2D is an interesting model. Its default payload sacrifices a lot of armor to mount a bit more firepower, though some argue the tradeoff isn't worth it. Its Alpha Strikes are better, though, so… I guess you can be the judge.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The UM-KM 'SuburbanMech' adapts the traditional UrbanMech R60 into an energy weapon platform for higher performance. Because its weapons aren't limited by ammunition concerns, the R90 is better-suited to longer engagements.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: The UM-KM 'SuburbanMech' adapts the traditional UrbanMech R60 into an energy weapon platform for higher performance. Because its weapons aren't limited by ammunition concerns, the R90 is better-suited to longer engagements.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: This is an UrbanMech variant I've never even heard of before. It's got the same armor as a standard R60, but this R90 is armed entirely with energy weapons, including a PPC for long-range power. I'm not sure why nobody thought of this sooner.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: This is an UrbanMech variant I've never even heard of before. It's got the same armor as a standard R60, but this R90 is armed entirely with energy weapons, including a PPC for long-range power. I'm not sure why nobody thought of this sooner.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Welcome to my Tournament, Commander. Here you will prove your mettle against the Periphery's fiercest champions. Today, your MechWarriors will demonstrate their worth using only the simplest of tools: the UM-R60 UrbanMech. Like a huntsman's spear, it is an instrument with a single purpose. Wield it skillfully, and ascend into triumph.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Welcome to my Tournament, Commander. Here you will prove your mettle against the Periphery's fiercest champions. Today, your MechWarriors will demonstrate their worth using only the simplest of tools: the UM-R60 UrbanMech. Like a huntsman's spear, it is an instrument with a single purpose. Wield it skillfully, and ascend into triumph.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: An Urbie is basically a walking dustbin with a mounted AC/10. That autocannon packs a hell of a punch, but it's got only 8 shots. Keep an eye on those ammo counters, {COMMANDER.FirstName}.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: An Urbie is basically a walking dustbin with a mounted AC/10. That autocannon packs a hell of a punch, but it's got only 8 shots. Keep an eye on those ammo counters, {COMMANDER.FirstName}.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: ATTN ANDREW (this is hostile to all)
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: ATTN ANDREW (this is hostile to all)

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: MECHWARRIORS! You stand alone in the carcass of an abandoned city. This sepulchre of commerce is now reborn as a hunting ground and field of battle, all at the command of my master, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: MECHWARRIORS! You stand alone in the carcass of an abandoned city. This sepulchre of commerce is now reborn as a hunting ground and field of battle, all at the command of my master, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: You honor me, Gigante! I am pleased. To our guests, I bid you welcome! Ready yourselves to test your might in my TOURNAMENT OF CHAMPIONS!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: You honor me, Gigante! I am pleased. To our guests, I bid you welcome! Ready yourselves to test your might in my TOURNAMENT OF CHAMPIONS!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, today your lance will face off against four of the deadliest killers the Rimward Periphery has to offer. Two of these terrors stand before you now; the rest lurk in the shadows like predators on the hunt, waiting for an exposed flank or a bared throat. If you drop your guard, they'll eat you alive.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}, today your lance will face off against four of the deadliest killers the Rimward Periphery has to offer. Two of these terrors stand before you now; the rest lurk in the shadows like predators on the hunt, waiting for an exposed flank or a bared throat. If you drop your guard, they'll eat you alive.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: They won't get the chance, Professor Horvat. I will butcher these amateurs before your "lurking predators" even show their faces. I am the Terror of Fronc! The Scourge of Sacromonte! I AM "LIMPET" SAITO!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: They won't get the chance, Professor Horvat. I will butcher these amateurs before your "lurking predators" even show their faces. I am the Terror of Fronc! The Scourge of Sacromonte! I AM "LIMPET" SAITO!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Gods. This is like something out of a Brock Armstrong flick.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Gods. This is like something out of a Brock Armstrong flick.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: And so, the table is set. At one end, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}'s battle-hardened mercenaries. At the other, a throng of deadly lone wolves, each bound to the other by their shared lust for victory! Let the air be filled with the bark of autocannon fire! Let the ground THUNDER with your approach! LET THE TOURNAMENT BEGIN!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: And so, the table is set. At one end, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}'s battle-hardened mercenaries. At the other, a throng of deadly lone wolves, each bound to the other by their shared lust for victory! Let the air be filled with the bark of autocannon fire! Let the ground THUNDER with your approach! LET THE TOURNAMENT BEGIN!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Well done, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! Very well done indeed. You have taken this round and vanquished your foes.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Well done, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! Very well done indeed. You have taken this round and vanquished your foes.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: I haven't tapped out yet, Horvat! You'll never hear me yield!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: I haven't tapped out yet, Horvat! You'll never hear me yield!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: You don't need to yield. You've lost. And you'll be spending the remainder of this tournament in a holding cell.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: You don't need to yield. You've lost. And you'll be spending the remainder of this tournament in a holding cell.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Thank you, Gigante. To this round's victors, I invite you to bask in your triumph, but prepare yourselves. Tomorrow, you face the ultimate challenge. Tomorrow, your true test begins!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Thank you, Gigante. To this round's victors, I invite you to bask in your triumph, but prepare yourselves. Tomorrow, you face the ultimate challenge. Tomorrow, your true test begins!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: A terrible shame, Commander. Your MechWarriors have been eliminated. Your time in this contest is over.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: A terrible shame, Commander. Your MechWarriors have been eliminated. Your time in this contest is over.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: New contacts on sensors, Commander. These units don't match {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} signatures. We've got a new player on the field.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: New contacts on sensors, Commander. These units don't match {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} signatures. We've got a new player on the field.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Grace under fire, folks. Lay it on 'em!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Grace under fire, folks. Lay it on 'em!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: This is Quebec Actual, return fire and check your rear arc!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: This is Quebec Actual, return fire and check your rear arc!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Commander, the friendly {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} has been destroyed.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Commander, the friendly {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} has been destroyed.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Commander, our employer's allied forces have been destroyed.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Commander, our employer's allied forces have been destroyed.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Behold, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! The stalking predators reveal themselves!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Behold, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}! The stalking predators reveal themselves!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: You've got that right, Professor. I'm Basilisk Jackson, and I'm the meanest MechJock on this or any other planet! I'm gonna put these fools in the ground!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: You've got that right, Professor. I'm Basilisk Jackson, and I'm the meanest MechJock on this or any other planet! I'm gonna put these fools in the ground!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Wow. Don't know about you, but I'm quaking in my boots. Let's light 'em up!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Wow. Don't know about you, but I'm quaking in my boots. Let's light 'em up!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: {COMMANDER.Name} look out, there's {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys here too. Don't that beat it all.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: {COMMANDER.Name} look out, there's {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} bad guys here too. Don't that beat it all.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: I'm inbound to the LZ Commander.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Heads up, Commander. That Drop Pod must belong to the "wild card" contestant that Horvat warned us about.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Heads up, Commander. That Drop Pod must belong to the "wild card" contestant that Horvat warned us about.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Very perceptive, Ms. Meyer! I caught this young lady snooping around the tournament grounds. She claims that I'm responsible for the death of her father.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Very perceptive, Ms. Meyer! I caught this young lady snooping around the tournament grounds. She claims that I'm responsible for the death of her father.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: You are responsible, you son of a bitch! And by my hand, he will be avenged!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: You are responsible, you son of a bitch! And by my hand, he will be avenged!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: I admire your grit, Ms. Jones. But if you want a shot at me, you'll need to fight your way out of the arena first. Kill or be killed! Let the games continue!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: I admire your grit, Ms. Jones. But if you want a shot at me, you'll need to fight your way out of the arena first. Kill or be killed! Let the games continue!

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Our Employer has offered a bonus if we eliminate this group as well.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: All our objectives are complete, cover our withdraw, Commander.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: We won't get paid for covering their evac if we leave before them, plan accodingly Commander.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Thanks for the assist, we're clear.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: That's it Commander, we did what we came here to do. Come on home.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Your attention please! We have a latecomer en route to join our Tournament. Consider her a wild card, if you will; when her Drop Pod hits the ground, I expect that she'll attempt to butcher the lot of you. I advise you to deny her the opportunity! Kill her before she kills you!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provie support to achieve the primary objective. When it's done we have orders to proceed to our Evac.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: That's an affirmative, XO Olivera. We're on station and will provie support to achieve the primary objective. When it's done we have orders to proceed to our Evac.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Understood Lance leader, glad to have you with us.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: . Looks like we have some unexpeted support from {TEAM_EMP_ALLY.FactionDef.Demonym} forces.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Glad we could make it to the party Commander. Our orders are to assist in the Primary Objective and once eliminated head for Evac.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Copy that lance leader, welcome to the party.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Copy that lance leader, welcome to the party.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Copy that lance leader, welcome to the party.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Let the people of Fronc sleep easy! THE BROTHERS SAITO ARE DEAD!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Let the people of Fronc sleep easy! THE BROTHERS SAITO ARE DEAD!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: My master's would-be assassin has fallen, but still she lives! Her ejection pod has saved her… but for how long?
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: My master's would-be assassin has fallen, but still she lives! Her ejection pod has saved her… but for how long?

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Behold, Professor! Basilisk Jackson and his silent partner are down, their BattleMechs shattered, their bodies torn to bloody rags!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Behold, Professor! Basilisk Jackson and his silent partner are down, their BattleMechs shattered, their bodies torn to bloody rags!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: It's glorious, Gigante. A display fit for a king.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: It's glorious, Gigante. A display fit for a king.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Welcome to the final round of my Tournament, Commander. Today, your two finest pilots will face off against the cream of the Frontier MechWarrior community. This will be a battle like no other, a clash between veritable gods. I wish your fighters luck, Commander—and I promise you, they will need it.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Welcome to the final round of my Tournament, Commander. Today, your two finest pilots will face off against the cream of the Frontier MechWarrior community. This will be a battle like no other, a clash between veritable gods. I wish your fighters luck, Commander—and I promise you, they will need it.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Horvat's going to stack the odds against us, just like Agent Jones said. If we're going to do this, our MechWarriors will have to be ready.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Horvat's going to stack the odds against us, just like Agent Jones said. If we're going to do this, our MechWarriors will have to be ready.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Challengers! You have already proven your might in the arena. Now, you will show Professor Horvat your fortitude.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Challengers! You have already proven your might in the arena. Now, you will show Professor Horvat your fortitude.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Indeed they will, Gigante. Indeed they will. Contestants, I call upon you to destroy your rivals! Smash their BattleMechs without hesitation or mercy, for only one of you may be crowned champion!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Indeed they will, Gigante. Indeed they will. Contestants, I call upon you to destroy your rivals! Smash their BattleMechs without hesitation or mercy, for only one of you may be crowned champion!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Gods, what a fighter! I yield to you, Commander—never since Calamar Gigante have I seen such awe-inspiring strength!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Gods, what a fighter! I yield to you, Commander—never since Calamar Gigante have I seen such awe-inspiring strength!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: I weep with joy, for I am no longer alone.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: I weep with joy, for I am no longer alone.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: You've earned your million C-Bills, Commander. More than that, you've earned my respect. Meet me in orbit, that I may grant you your reward.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: You've earned your million C-Bills, Commander. More than that, you've earned my respect. Meet me in orbit, that I may grant you your reward.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: A terrible shame, Commander. Your MechWarriors have been eliminated, their BattleMechs torn to scrap. I'm afraid that your time in the Tournament has come to an end.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: A terrible shame, Commander. Your MechWarriors have been eliminated, their BattleMechs torn to scrap. I'm afraid that your time in the Tournament has come to an end.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Can't say I didn't warn you, Commander. Such a shame. We could've taken Horvat down together. Instead, you're walking away with nothing but a couple of dead pilots.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Can't say I didn't warn you, Commander. Such a shame. We could've taken Horvat down together. Instead, you're walking away with nothing but a couple of dead pilots.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: New contacts on sensors, Commander. These units don't match {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} signatures. We've got a new player on the field.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: New contacts on sensors, Commander. These units don't match {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} signatures. We've got a new player on the field.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Competitors! You have shown yourselves worthy of the greatest honor this Tournament can bestow: the right to face off against the great man himself, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Competitors! You have shown yourselves worthy of the greatest honor this Tournament can bestow: the right to face off against the great man himself, PROFESSOR MENCIUS HORVAT!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: This is no joke, Mr. Virtanen! I have taken the field myself to put your warriors to their final test. If they defeat me, the prize purse is yours. Should they fail, I will grant them a most glorious death. En garde, Tournament finalists! Your fur-wreathed doom is at hand!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: We've got an unidentified Leopard hanging out in high orbit, Commander. Could be another surprise, like Agent Jones.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: We've got an unidentified Leopard hanging out in high orbit, Commander. Could be another surprise, like Agent Jones.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Could be, but Gigante isn't making any grand announcements this time. That's kind of an alarming change of pace, don't you think?
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Could be, but Gigante isn't making any grand announcements this time. That's kind of an alarming change of pace, don't you think?

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Maybe. Who knows? Just keep focused on the fight, Commander. We'll deal with any surprises if and when they appear.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Maybe. Who knows? Just keep focused on the fight, Commander. We'll deal with any surprises if and when they appear.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Professor Mencius Horvat is waiting for you in the Tournament arena. He expects you to play by his rules—to let him lead a pair of your MechWarriors like lambs to the slaughter. Instead, you're going to show him the kind of firepower that your company can really bring down. Destroy him, and the MIIO will reward you accordingly.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Professor Mencius Horvat is waiting for you in the Tournament arena. He expects you to play by his rules—to let him lead a pair of your MechWarriors like lambs to the slaughter. Instead, you're going to show him the kind of firepower that your company can really bring down. Destroy him, and the MIIO will reward you accordingly.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: She got through that entire briefing without saying, "The hunter will become the hunted." I'm pleasantly surprised.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: She got through that entire briefing without saying, "The hunter will become the hunted." I'm pleasantly surprised.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: So, {COMMANDER.Callsign}. You have elected to violate the rules of my Tournament. You've decided to kill me, perhaps? To take on the great hunter in his den?
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: So, {COMMANDER.Callsign}. You have elected to violate the rules of my Tournament. You've decided to kill me, perhaps? To take on the great hunter in his den?

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: What a welcome diversion this is! Truly glorious. I had intended to challenge your MechWarriors when the Tournament was finished, as is my custom—to put them to the final test. Instead, you've provided me with a full lance of quarry to hunt down and slaughter. We'll enjoy this, won't we, Gigante?
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: What a welcome diversion this is! Truly glorious. I had intended to challenge your MechWarriors when the Tournament was finished, as is my custom—to put them to the final test. Instead, you've provided me with a full lance of quarry to hunt down and slaughter. We'll enjoy this, won't we, Gigante?

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: As you say, Professor Horvat. When we enter the arena, I will personally rend these overconfident fools limb from quivering limb.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: As you say, Professor Horvat. When we enter the arena, I will personally rend these overconfident fools limb from quivering limb.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: There you have it, Commander. Something to look forward to. Between now and then, I present you with the remaining contestants of the Tournament of Champions. I'm sure that they'll keep you occupied until our Drop Pods arrive.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: There you have it, Commander. Something to look forward to. Between now and then, I present you with the remaining contestants of the Tournament of Champions. I'm sure that they'll keep you occupied until our Drop Pods arrive.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: You've done well, Commander. There's a small army of Federation freight captains out there who'll sleep a whole a lot easier tonight.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: You've done well, Commander. There's a small army of Federation freight captains out there who'll sleep a whole a lot easier tonight.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Always a pleasure to do work for the MIIO. Speaking of which, I believe that you owe us a substantial amount of money.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Always a pleasure to do work for the MIIO. Speaking of which, I believe that you owe us a substantial amount of money.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Yes, ma'am, I do. And as soon as the MIIO finishes springing me from this prison cell, I'll be happy to settle up.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Yes, ma'am, I do. And as soon as the MIIO finishes springing me from this prison cell, I'll be happy to settle up.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Your MechWarriors lie dead at my feet, just as I promised! Now take the rest of your pathetic company and go. I have tested you, Commander, and you have been found wanting.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Your MechWarriors lie dead at my feet, just as I promised! Now take the rest of your pathetic company and go. I have tested you, Commander, and you have been found wanting.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: New contacts on sensors, Commander. These units don't match {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} signatures. We've got a new player on the field.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: New contacts on sensors, Commander. These units don't match {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} signatures. We've got a new player on the field.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Kilo 1-3 just got smoked! Suffering loses over here, Commander! We're still in the fight, but down one.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Grace under fire, folks. Lay it on 'em!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Grace under fire, folks. Lay it on 'em!

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: This is Quebec Actual, return fire and check your rear arc!
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: This is Quebec Actual, return fire and check your rear arc!

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Commander, the friendly {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} has been destroyed.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Commander, our employer's allied forces have been destroyed.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: This is an ecological disaster, shame on you.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: This is an ecological disaster, shame on you.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Smoke making evenmies hard to target you, but also impacts your targeting ability. Units passing through burning forest only sink 50% of their normal Heat.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Smoke making evenmies hard to target you, but also impacts your targeting ability. Units passing through burning forest only sink 50% of their normal Heat.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Units passing through burning terrain only sink 50% of their normal Heat.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Units passing through burning terrain only sink 50% of their normal Heat.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Double Heat Sinks provide twice the efficiency of standard Heat Sinks, though with increased bulkiness. Like standard Heat Sinks, their effectiveness can be impacted by the surrounding environment, positively or negatively.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Double Heat Sinks provide twice the efficiency of standard Heat Sinks, though with increased bulkiness. Like standard Heat Sinks, their effectiveness can be impacted by the surrounding environment, positively or negatively.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Thermal Exchangers reduce the overall heat generated from weapon attacks by a fixed percentage. Unlike Heat Sink components, Thermal Exchangers are not impacted by the surrounding environment.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Thermal Exchangers reduce the overall heat generated from weapon attacks by a fixed percentage. Unlike Heat Sink components, Thermal Exchangers are not impacted by the surrounding environment.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: One of the most heavily armed and armored 'Mechs ever constructed, the King Crab A is capable of massive burst damage. A pair of heavy, close-range Autocannons form its primary weaponry, backed up by ranged weaponry to fire as it closes distance.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: One of the most heavily armed and armored 'Mechs ever constructed, the King Crab A is capable of massive burst damage. A pair of heavy, close-range Autocannons form its primary weaponry, backed up by ranged weaponry to fire as it closes distance.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The Shadow Hawk KM is an interesting model. Its default payload sacrifices a lot of armor to mount a bit more firepower, though some argue the tradeoff isn't worth it. Its Alpha Strikes are better, though, so… I guess you can be the judge.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: The Shadow Hawk KM is an interesting model. Its default payload sacrifices a lot of armor to mount a bit more firepower, though some argue the tradeoff isn't worth it. Its Alpha Strikes are better, though, so… I guess you can be the judge.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The UM-KM 'SuburbanMech' adapts the traditional UrbanMech R60 into an energy weapon platform for higher performance. Because its weapons aren't limited by ammunition concerns, the R90 is better-suited to longer engagements.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: The UM-KM 'SuburbanMech' adapts the traditional UrbanMech R60 into an energy weapon platform for higher performance. Because its weapons aren't limited by ammunition concerns, the R90 is better-suited to longer engagements.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Rangefinders increase the range at which targets can be visually acquired for direct targeting or spotting for support fire.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Rangefinders increase the range at which targets can be visually acquired for direct targeting or spotting for support fire.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Provides a [AMT] bonus to actions that generate Morale.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Provides a [AMT] bonus to actions that generate Morale.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Provides a [INVERSE_AMT] bonus to Lance Initiative.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Provides a [INVERSE_AMT] bonus to Lance Initiative.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: PASSIVE: A 'Mech piloted by this MechWarrior can move after shooting if it has not moved yet.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: PASSIVE: A 'Mech piloted by this MechWarrior can move after shooting if it has not moved yet.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: PASSIVE: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from normal movement actions (can exceed the unit's maximum).
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: PASSIVE: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from normal movement actions (can exceed the unit's maximum).

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: PASSIVE: This unit gains ENTRENCHED from normal movement actions.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: PASSIVE: This unit gains ENTRENCHED from normal movement actions.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Comms System upgrades allow for better lance cohesion during combat, increasing the Morale generated.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: PASSIVE: COVER and GUARDED states both provide 40% damage reduction rather than 20% damage reduction. COVER and GUARDED together provide 60% damage reduction.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock targeting and tracking system—or TTS—which can be upgraded for improved performance. Upgrades increase accuracy when attacking with Ballistic, Energy, and Missile weaponry.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock targeting and tracking system—or TTS—which can be upgraded for improved performance. Upgrades increase accuracy when attacking with Ballistic, Energy, and Missile weaponry.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: All weapon attacks have their hit improved by [AMT].
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: All weapon attacks have their hit improved by [AMT].

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/10s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/10s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Intended for use as supporting fire at very long range, LBX/2s deal moderate damage with low heat and a large ammunition count per ton. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/2s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Intended for use as supporting fire at very long range, LBX/2s deal moderate damage with low heat and a large ammunition count per ton. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/2s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire.

Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/10s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Flamer weapons are unique in that they deal little physical damage but instead expel superheated plasma, applying substantial heat to their target. When done properly, this can hamper enemy return fire or even cause the targeted unit to shut down from overheating.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Flamer weapons are unique in that they deal little physical damage but instead expel superheated plasma, applying substantial heat to their target. When done properly, this can hamper enemy return fire or even cause the targeted unit to shut down from overheating.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Импульсный скорострельный рельсотрон. Поддреживает возможность стрельбы очередями. Рельсотрон – это линейный ускоритель, который использует сверхпроводящие электроды для того, чтобы придать сплошному снаряду сверхзвуковую скорость. Столкновение снаряда с целью, сопровождаемое выделением огромного количества кинетической энергии, оказывает разрушительный эффект даже на большом расстоянии.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. Unlike Autocannons, Gauss Rifles do not suffer recoil effects from firing and have a baseline bonus to accuracy.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. Unlike Autocannons, Gauss Rifles do not suffer recoil effects from firing and have a baseline bonus to accuracy.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: [AMT] Difficulty to all of this unit's attacks until its next activation.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: [AMT] Difficulty to all of this unit's attacks until its next activation.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to switch firing mode

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: A chemical laser is a laser that obtains its energy from a chemical reaction. This weapon uses an ammo bin for an internal resevoir to hold the chemicals. It can also be used as a normal medium laser without ammo. Firing modes: B: default mode (no ammo needed) +1 Accuracy (normal for all lasers). Rust: this mode needs ammo. +4 Accuracy damage on the target is increased 20% for 2 turns. will not stack but can be refreshed on the next hit. Cryo: this mode needs ammo. +4 Accuracy +10% chance to jam (for a 5 GunnerySkill pilot) leaves behind a cryogenic substance on the target slows movement to 10% reduces inititive for 2 turns Firing modes can be changed by clicking the right side of the weapons activation panel during combat.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: A chemical laser is a laser that obtains its energy from a chemical reaction. This weapon uses an ammo bin for an internal resevoir to hold the chemicals. It can also be used as a normal medium laser without ammo. Firing modes: B: default mode (no ammo needed) +1 Accuracy (normal for all lasers). Rust: this mode needs ammo. +4 Accuracy damage on the target is increased 20% for 2 turns. will not stack but can be refreshed on the next hit. Cryo: this mode needs ammo. +4 Accuracy +10% chance to jam (for a 5 GunnerySkill pilot) leaves behind a cryogenic substance on the target slows movement to 10% reduces inititive for 2 turns Firing modes can be changed by clicking the right side of the weapons activation panel during combat.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: An improvement upon standard Medium Lasers, Medium Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with increased heat and weight. Like all Lasers, Medium Pulse Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: An improvement upon standard Medium Lasers, Medium Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with increased heat and weight. Like all Lasers, Medium Pulse Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Medium Lasers are lightweight with respectable damage. Because of this, at least one can be found mounted on most units that cross the battlefield. Like all Lasers, Medium Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: Medium Lasers are lightweight with respectable damage. Because of this, at least one can be found mounted on most units that cross the battlefield. Like all Lasers, Medium Lasers enjoy a baseline accuracy bonus over other weapons.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The LRM10 rack of Long-Range Missiles occupies a supporting fire role when mounted on most units, with fairly low damage balanced by low heat and ammunition consumption. Like all LRMs, LRM10s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain with the benefit of a spotter unit.

Like all LRMs, LRM10s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain with the benefit of a spotter unit.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The smallest rack of Long-Range Missiles, LRM5s are efficient and tend to serve as harassment weapons. Like all LRMs, LRM5s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain with the benefit of a spotter unit.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: This custom made contraption which resembles a mortar can fire special rounds, described simply as large caliber warheads. It has two modes but the secondary mode is technically just forcing the cooldown mechanism to fail and hope it don't jam. Caution! The amount of damage and stability is ammo specific and in some cases could cause harm to allies in the area of impact. Firing modes: Normal: default mode +1 cooldown turn(penalty) Force: this mode attempts to bypass the cooldown +4 Recoil (penalty) Firing modes can be changed by clicking the right side of the weapons activation panel during combat.

The amount of damage and stability is ammo specific and in some cases could cause harm to allies in the area of impact. Firing modes: Normal: default mode +1 cooldown turn(penalty) Force: this mode attempts to bypass the cooldown +4 Recoil (penalty) Firing modes can be changed by clicking the right side of the weapons activation panel during combat.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: A Hellhammer Siege Cannon is a massive artillery piece deployed by the Imperial Guard that fires large rocket-propelled shells that are capable of destroying most fortified buildings in a single shot. The weapon is very similar in form and function to the Imperial Demolisher Cannon found on the Thunderer Siege Tank and Space Marine Vindicator tanks, with the exception that it is much larger, with a single shell weighing over 180 kilograms. The most common use of the Hellhammer Siege Cannon is as the main weapon on the Stormsword super-heavy tank of the Imperial Guard.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: A Hellhammer Siege Cannon is a massive artillery piece deployed by the Imperial Guard that fires large rocket-propelled shells that are capable of destroying most fortified buildings in a single shot. The weapon is very similar in form and function to the Imperial Demolisher Cannon found on the Thunderer Siege Tank and Space Marine Vindicator tanks, with the exception that it is much larger, with a single shell weighing over 180 kilograms. The most common use of the Hellhammer Siege Cannon is as the main weapon on the Stormsword super-heavy tank of the Imperial Guard.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Это оружие стреляет ионным лучом, взрывающимся при контакте с целью. Оно идеально подходит против легкой техники и тяжелобронированной пехоты. Ионная пушка может стрелять в усиленном режиме, производя мощный взрыв, способный нанести больший урон, хотя при этом есть риск перегрузки.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: The midtier rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM4s deal good damage for comparatively few negatives other than their inherently short range and need for ammunition. As for all SRMs, SRM4 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons.
Localization.CULTURE_EN_US: The midtier rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM4s deal good damage for comparatively few negatives other than their inherently short range and need for ammunition. As for all SRMs, SRM4 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: Изначально создана как средство мобильной артелерийской поддержики войск Космического Десанта устанавливается на шасси 'Носорог'. Была доработана для установки на боевые мехи. Благодаря системе обнаружения и ведения цели, 'Вихрь' может с поразительной точностью поражать замаскированные и укрепленные объекты. Стандартная комплектация установки включает осколочные ракеты на твердом топливе, выпускаемые по шесть за один программируемый залп. Сложная телеметрическая аппаратура 'Вихря' гарантирует максимальную эффективность артобстрела и дает лучшие результаты, нежели использование обычных осколочных снарядов.

Localization.CULTURE_DE_DE: SSRM6s are the largest available rack of Short-Range Missiles and pack considerable punch while also being lightweight. As for all SRMs, SRM6 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons.
